verses.name: 2 Kings 15:11
verses.text: And the rest of the acts of Zachariah, behold, they are written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel.

verses.name: 2 Kings 15:12
verses.text: This was the word of the Lord which he spake unto Jehu, saying, Thy sons shall sit on the throne of Israel unto the fourth generation. And so it came to pass.

verses.name: 2 Kings 15:13
verses.text: Shallum the son of Jabesh began to reign in the nine and thirtieth year of Uzziah king of Judah; and he reigned a full month in Samaria.
